institution.description: Institution in which the exam is performed

physician.description: Physician responsible for the interpretation of the imaging results

exam_date_time.description: Date and time of exam, format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss

urinary_tract_duplication.description: Duplication of urinary tract resulting in an 'additionnal' urinary tract to describe

renal_transplant.description: Presence of a renal transplant resulting in an 'additionnal' urinary tract to describe

urinary_upper_tract_results.description: Successive description of urinary tracts results, taking account of the (rare) possibility of anatomical variations

urinary_upper_tract_id.description: Generated hash id for each successively described urinary tract

diversion.description: Presence of a urinary diversion in the described urinary tract

renal_height_evolution.description: Evolution of the size according to the last ultrasound

previous_renal_height.description: Previous measured height of the kidney (mm)

pyelocaliceal_dilatation.description: Presence of pyelocaliceal dilatation of the kidney

interlabial_pelvic_diameter.description: Measurements of the interlabial diameter of the renal pelvis on a transverse section in mm

interlabial_pelvic_diameter_evolution.description: Evolution of the APD as compared to previous imaging exam

extrasinusal_pelvis.description: Measurements diameter of the extrarenal pelvis on a transverse section in mm

caliceal_dilatation.description: Description of the appearance of the calyces

renal_pelvic_wall.description: Presence of a thickened renal pelvic wall

renal_pelvis_content_echogenicity.description: Description of the echogenicity of the renal pelvis contents

parenchyma_thickness.description: The renal parenchyma is measured at the thinnest point of the parenchyma on the longitudinal section of the kidney(mm)

comment_on_cyst.description: Free text for a comment manually added to the description of the cyst

ureteral_dilatation.description: Ureteral dilatation, as evaluated by the physician

ureteral_diameter_retrovesical.description: Maximal measured diameter of the retrovesical ureter (mm)

ureteral_diameter_lumbar.description: Maximal measured diameter of the lumbar ureter (mm)

urinary_lower_tract_results.description: Description of urinary lower tracts results, taking account of the (rare) possibility of anatomical variations

diversion.description: Presence of a urinary diversion in the described urinary tract

location_of_the_bladder_wall_defect.description: Location of the bladder wall defect

bladder_wall_thickness.description: Measurement of bladder wall in mm

post_void_residual_bladder_volume.description: Post void residual volume in ml

dilated_posterior_urethra.description: Urethra dilatation, as evaluated by the physician

comment_on_lithiasis.description: Free text for a comment manually added to the description of the lithiasis.

conclusion.description: Text conclusion, automatically generated, and validated by the imaging physician

comment.description: Free text for manually added results, or comment

conclusion_validation.description: The physician must validate the automatically generated conclusion, after manual modification if required
